name: Flaming
description: The weapon is wreathed in magical flames. It deals an additional 1d6 fire damage on a hit.

name: Frost
description: The weapon is encrusted with magical frost. It deals an additional 1d6 cold damage on a hit.
This weapon is imbued with a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls.

name: +1 Defense
description: This armor is imbued with protective magic, granting a +1 bonus to AC.

name: Returning
description: This thrown weapon returns to the wielder's hand immediately after an attack.

name: Light
description: This item can shed bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet when activated.

name: Striding
description: These boots increase the wearer's walking speed by 10 feet.

name: Darkvision
description: While wearing these goggles, the user has darkvision out to a range of 60 feet.

name: Strength
description: This item enhances the wearer's strength, increasing their Strength score by 2, to a maximum of 20.

name: Fire Resistance
description: The wearer has resistance to fire damage while wearing this item.

name: Spell Storing
description: This item can store a spell of up to 3rd level, cast into it by a spellcaster. The spell can be cast from the item by using an action.

name: Mage Hand
description: This item allows the wielder to cast the Mage Hand cantrip at will.

name: Misty Step
description: This item allows the wielder to cast the Misty Step spell once per day.

name: Thundering
description: This weapon emits a thunderous boom when it strikes, dealing an extra 1d6 thunder damage and creating a loud noise that can be heard up to 300 feet away.

name: Vampiric
description: When you hit with an attack using this weapon, you gain temporary hit points equal to half the damage dealt by the enchantment.
